mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_BOARD ( Q_NUM, Q_ID, Q_CODE, Q_CATEGORY, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENTS, Q_DATE, Q_PRODUCT, Q_STATUS Q_CONTENTSPW, Q_RELEVEL, Q_GROUPNUM ) VALUES ( Q_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{Q_ID}, #{Q_CODE}, #{Q_CATEGORY}, #{Q_TITLE}, #{Q_CONTENTS, SYSDATE, #{Q_PRODUCT}, '답변대기', #{Q_CONTENTSPW}, 0, Q_SEQ.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT Q_ID, Q_CODE, Q_CATEGORY, Q_TITLE, Q_DATE, Q_PRODUCT, Q_STATUS, Q_RELEVEL, Q_GROUPNUM FROM QNA_BOARD ORDER BY Q_NUM DESC, Q_RELEVEL ASC
SELECT Q_ID, Q_CODE, Q_CATEGORY, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENTS, Q_DATE, Q_PRODUCT, Q_STATUS FROM QNA_BOARD ORDER BY Q_NUM = #{Q_NUM}
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA_BOARD SET Q_CATEGORY = #{Q_CATEGORY}, Q_CONTENTS = #{Q_CONTENTS}, Q_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE Q_NUM = #{Q_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT Q_CODE, Q_TITLE, Q_DATE, Q_PRODUCT, Q_STATUS, Q_RELEVEL, Q_GROUPNUM FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE Q_ID = #{Q_ID} ORDER BY Q_NUM DESC, Q_RELEVEL ASC
